attribute_descrip: Strength measures bodily power,athletic training, and the extent for which you can exert raw physical force.
Dexterity measure agilty, reflexes, and balance. measures bodily power,athletic training, and the extent for which you can exert raw physical force.
Constitution measures health, stamina, and vital force.
Inteliigence measures mental acuity, accurracy of recall, and the ability to reason.
Wisdom reflects how attuned you are to the world around you and represents perceptiveness and intuition.
Charisma measure your ability to effectively interact with others.
